Mr. '''R. Zelner''' is [[Rachel Greene]]'s boss at [[Ralph Lauren Corporation]]. He was portrayed  by [[Steve Ireland]].

Rachel inadvertently kisses him during her job interview but still gets hired. He seems very timid and serious about his job at Ralph Lauren.

He also has a son, [[Ross Zelner]], who is interested in dinosaurs, which [[Ross Geller]] uses as an avenue to convince him to offer Rachel her job back when she's fired after being caught interviewing for a job with Gucci. He also thinks that Ross' (Geller) name is "Ron" and the latter doesn't correct him.

==Trivia==
* In "[[The One Where Rachel Goes Back To Work]]", he says that he would follow Ralph Lauren "into hell" before whispering "Microphones..." to [[Gavin Mitchell]]. 
* He has the same initials (R.Z.) as his son.
